name: Extreme Roller Skater 3D Free Street Racing Skating Game
name_original: Extreme Roller Skater 3D Free Street Racing Skating Game
description:
Extreme Roller Skater 3D is an addictive free roller skating racing game in a traffic bound downtown street road with bounty collection makes to uplift your sporting spirits to the highest level of action thrills with natural 3d animations of jump, pedal, spin stunts or tricks etc. Highly addictive roller coaster extreme skate racing is waiting for you.

Have you ever thought of high speed roller skating in big cities without any real accidents ? Game is well suited for outdoor or indoor sports gamers as well as car or motor cycle or bike riding racing gaming experts. Excellent game for kids including boys & girls.

Now you can - with this Extreme Roller Skater 3D!

As you cross certain game thresholds of speed and distance, roller skating speed moves to next level automatically to get more thrill. Try, not to hit moving vehicle objects while collecting bounties either same or opposite side of the road. Learn to focus and maneuver or steer the roller skates using motion or button or joystick controls. More you collect, more to brag about it in game center with others. Some bounty collections are more valuable than others, so don't miss the street party fun!

Don't miss this wonderful 3D Extreme Roller Skater game with modern cityscape track and various biker natural animations. Also try to find out hidden or surprise random animations during game play. Also as a bonus, we added new cool bridge track to extend the cool play. Total thrill & addictive.

Also custom level for absorbing music and motion sensitivity levels to fit your needs.

What are you waiting for ? Thrill never stops! Ready, Set, Go.!

Fun starts here and never stops with superb background music blended with wheels, decks and landing gear makes it own grinding noise.

To treat yourself, early holiday gifts is on its way. So now, new and fresh cool Extreme Roller Skater 3D game in your pocket. Play it any time and any where. Enjoy. So why wait ? Download it now..! Limited time special offer.

Key Features:

* Play mode to control skaters - Motion sensor with sensitivity adjustment, Easy touch Joystick controls or old style D-Pad.
* Multiple track - Busy downtown street or Sci-fi bridge
* Play mode to control skaters - Motion sensor with sensitivity adjustment, Easy touch Joystick controls or old style D-Pad.
* Racing against the time to pickup as many gift points and collectibles.
* Perfect mobile game with fast skate free roaming to do tricks or stunts adventure.
* For iOS app users, option to pick up your own device music library playlist is also available
